/.title: Smart Home Energy Management & Optimization Platform
/.description: Connect your solar, battery, and EV charger to save money automatically. Real-time optimization, grid services, and rewards for distributed energy resources.

/platform.title: Energy Coordination Platform for DER Management
/platform.description: Real-time coordination of distributed energy resources with 200ms local execution. Connect inverters, batteries, and EV chargers to one unified platform.

/zap.title: Zap - Smart Energy Gateway
/zap.description: Connect your solar, battery, and EV charger to the Sourceful network. Get real-time optimization and earn rewards.

/v2x.title: V2X - Vehicle-to-Everything
/v2x.description: Turn your EV into a home battery. Charge when cheap, power your home during peak prices, and earn from grid services.

/developers.title: Developers
/developers.description: Build on the Sourceful Platform. Access real-time energy data, control APIs, and SDKs for energy applications.

/use-cases/homeowners.title: For Homeowners
/use-cases/homeowners.description: Take control of your home energy. Optimize solar, battery, and EV charging automatically to cut bills and earn rewards.

/use-cases/utilities.title: For Utilities
/use-cases/utilities.description: Coordinate thousands of distributed energy resources in real-time. Local execution at 200ms for grid flexibility and VPP services.

/use-cases/installers.title: For Installers
/use-cases/installers.description: Offer your customers ongoing value with Sourceful. White-label apps, monitoring, and recurring revenue opportunities.

/use-cases/oems.title: For OEMs
/use-cases/oems.description: Integrate Sourceful into your hardware. Pre-integrated connectivity, cloud services, and grid services out of the box.

/about.title: About Us
/about.description: Sourceful is building the local energy coordination infrastructure. Based in Sweden, serving the global energy transition.

/contact.title: Contact
/contact.description: Get in touch with the Sourceful team. We're here to help with integrations, partnerships, and support.

/community.title: Community
/community.description: Join the Sourceful community. Connect with other users, share insights, and help shape the future of distributed energy.

/blog.title: Blog
/blog.description: Insights on distributed energy, grid flexibility, home energy optimization, and the future of local energy coordination.

/integrations.title: Integrations
/integrations.description: Sourceful works with leading solar inverters, batteries, and EV chargers. See all supported brands and devices.

/get-started.title: Get Started
/get-started.description: Set up your Zap and connect your energy devices to Sourceful. Quick guides for P1 meters and inverters.

/get-started/zap.title: Zap Setup Guide
/get-started/zap.description: Step-by-step guide to set up your Zap with a P1 meter. Connect to your home energy in minutes.

/get-started/zap-for-inverters.title: Zap for Inverters Setup Guide
/get-started/zap-for-inverters.description: Connect your Zap directly to your solar inverter. Full guide for inverter integration.

/tools.title: Energy Tools & Calculators
/tools.description: Free tools to understand your energy usage. Calculate savings, size your battery, and estimate EV charging costs.

/tools/savings-calculator.title: Energy Savings Calculator
/tools/savings-calculator.description: Calculate how much you could save with smart energy management. Based on Swedish electricity prices.

/tools/battery-sizing.title: Battery Sizing Calculator
/tools/battery-sizing.description: Find the right battery size for your home. Based on your consumption and solar production.

/tools/ev-charging.title: EV Charging Cost Calculator
/tools/ev-charging.description: Calculate your EV charging costs at home vs public charging. Optimize your charging schedule.

/tools/solar-roi.title: Solar ROI Calculator
/tools/solar-roi.description: Calculate the return on investment for solar panels. See payback time and lifetime savings.

/tools/v2x-savings.title: V2X Savings Calculator
/tools/v2x-savings.description: Estimate your savings with vehicle-to-grid technology. Turn your EV into a revenue source.

/privacy.title: Privacy Policy
/privacy.description: How Sourceful handles your data. Our commitment to privacy and GDPR compliance.

/terms.title: Terms of Service
/terms.description: Terms and conditions for using Sourceful products and services.

/app.title: Sourceful App
/app.description: Download the Sourceful app to monitor and control your home energy. Available on iOS and Android.

/company.title: Company
/company.description: Learn about Sourceful Energy. Our mission, team, and vision for the future of distributed energy.

/tools/negative-prices.title: Negative Price Analyzer
/tools/negative-prices.description: Analyze negative electricity prices in your area. Find opportunities to get paid for using energy.

/assets.title: Brand Assets
/assets.description: Sourceful brand assets, logos, and design resources for partners and press.

/careers.title: Careers at Sourceful
/careers.description: Join Sourceful and build the future of distributed energy. We're a small team solving big problems in local energy coordination.

/about.title: About Sourceful
/about.description: Learn about Sourceful Energy. Our mission to build local energy coordination infrastructure, our team, and our investors.

/community.title: Community
/community.description: Join the Sourceful community. Connect with developers, installers, and energy enthusiasts building the future of distributed energy.

/pricing.title: Pricing
/pricing.description: Simple, transparent pricing for Sourceful products. Zap gateway, Pro subscription, and enterprise solutions.

/contact.title: Contact Us
/contact.description: Get in touch with Sourceful Energy. Questions about products, partnerships, or just want to say hello.

/get-started.title: Get Started with Sourceful
/get-started.description: Set up your Sourceful system in minutes. Connect your solar, battery, or EV charger and start optimizing.
